package.name: linux-amd64
package.unpack: major=` echo $PKGVERSION | awk -F '.' '{print $1}' ` minor=` echo $PKGVERSION | awk -F '.' '{print $2}' ` unxz -c ${SRCDIR}/linux-${major}.${minor}.tar.xz | tar xf -
package.patch:
localversion='ll-64-0'
major=` echo $PKGVERSION | awk -F '.' '{print $1}' ` minor=` echo $PKGVERSION | awk -F '.' '{print $2}' ` cd linux-${major}.${minor} [ -f ${SRCDIR}/patch-${PKGVERSION}.xz ] && unxz -c ${SRCDIR}/patch-${PKGVERSION}.xz | patch -p1 cp -v ${SRCDIR}/lesslinux-fblogo-20100922.ppm drivers/video/logo/logo_linux_clut224.ppm cp -v ${SRCDIR}/linux-${major}.${minor}-config-amd64 .config sed -i 's/CONFIG_LOCALVERSION=""/CONFIG_LOCALVERSION="-'$localversion'"/g' .config cd .. mv linux-${major}.${minor} linux-${PKGVERSION} mkdir linux-${PKGVERSION}.build tar -C linux-${PKGVERSION} -cf - . | tar -C linux-${PKGVERSION}.build -xf - tar -C ../linux-${PKGVERSION}.build -cvf - certs/signing_key.pem certs/x509.genkey | tar -xf -
package.build:
cd linux-${PKGVERSION}.build
export PATH=/usr/local/crosstools-amd64-klibc/bin:$PATH export OBJDUMP=/usr/local/crosstools-amd64-klibc/bin/x86_64-linux-gnu-objdump
echo 'PATH=/usr/local/crosstools-amd64-klibc/bin:$PATH' > ../linux-${PKGVERSION}/environment.inc echo 'OBJDUMP=/usr/local/crosstools-amd64-klibc/bin/x86_64-linux-gnu-objdump' >> ../linux-${PKGVERSION}/environment.inc echo 'CC=/usr/local/crosstools-amd64-klibc/bin/x86_64-linux-gnu-gcc' >> ../linux-${PKGVERSION}/environment.inc
echo 'ARCH=x86_64' > ../linux-${PKGVERSION}/arch.inc echo 'CROSS_COMPILE="x86_64-linux-gnu-"' > ../linux-${PKGVERSION}/crosscompile.inc
yes '' | make ARCH=x86_64 CROSS_COMPILE="x86_64-linux-gnu-" oldconfig
jobcount=4 if [ -n "$DISTCC_POTENTIAL_HOSTS" ] ; then jobcount=` expr $DISTCC_HOSTCOUNT '*' 3 ` make -j $jobcount \ ARCH=x86_64 \ CROSS_COMPILE=x86_64-linux-gnu- \ CC='distcc /usr/local/crosstools-amd64-klibc/bin/x86_64-linux-gnu-gcc' \ OBJDUMP=/usr/local/crosstools-amd64-klibc/bin/x86_64-linux-gnu-objdump \ bzImage make -j $jobcount \ ARCH=x86_64 \ CROSS_COMPILE=x86_64-linux-gnu- \ CC='distcc /usr/local/crosstools-amd64-klibc/bin/x86_64-linux-gnu-gcc' \ OBJDUMP=/usr/local/crosstools-amd64-klibc/bin/x86_64-linux-gnu-objdump make -j $jobcount \ ARCH=x86_64 \ CROSS_COMPILE=x86_64-linux-gnu- \ CC='distcc /usr/local/crosstools-amd64-klibc/bin/x86_64-linux-gnu-gcc' \ OBJDUMP=/usr/local/crosstools-amd64-klibc/bin/x86_64-linux-gnu-objdump \ bzImage else make -j $jobcount ARCH=x86_64 CROSS_COMPILE="x86_64-linux-gnu-" OBJDUMP=/usr/local/crosstools-amd64-klibc/bin/x86_64-linux-gnu-objdump bzImage make -j $jobcount ARCH=x86_64 CROSS_COMPILE="x86_64-linux-gnu-" OBJDUMP=/usr/local/crosstools-amd64-klibc/bin/x86_64-linux-gnu-objdump make -j $jobcount ARCH=x86_64 CROSS_COMPILE="x86_64-linux-gnu-" OBJDUMP=/usr/local/crosstools-amd64-klibc/bin/x86_64-linux-gnu-objdump bzImage fi cd ../linux-${PKGVERSION} make -j $jobcount ARCH=x86_64 CROSS_COMPILE="x86_64-linux-gnu-" OBJDUMP=/usr/local/crosstools-amd64-klibc/bin/x86_64-linux-gnu-objdump modules_prepare
package.install:
localversion='ll-64-0'
export PATH=/usr/local/crosstools-amd64-klibc/bin:$PATH export OBJDUMP=/usr/local/crosstools-amd64-klibc/bin/x86_64-linux-gnu-objdump
cd linux-${PKGVERSION}.build mkdir -p ${TGTDIR}/boot mkdir -p ${TGTDIR}/usr/src/linux-${PKGVERSION}-${localversion} ln -sf linux-${PKGVERSION}-${localversion} ${TGTDIR}/usr/src/linux-lesslinux-amd64 INSTALL_MOD_PATH=${TGTDIR} make ARCH=x86_64 CROSS_COMPILE=x86_64-linux-gnu- OBJDUMP=/usr/local/crosstools-amd64-klibc/bin/x86_64-linux-gnu-objdump modules_install install -m 0644 arch/x86/boot/bzImage ${TGTDIR}/boot/vmlinuz-${PKGVERSION}-${localversion} rm -rf ${TGTDIR}/lib/firmware ln -sf ${PKGVERSION}-${localversion} ${TGTDIR}/lib/modules/lesslinux-amd64 for link in source build ; do rm ${TGTDIR}/lib/modules/${PKGVERSION}-${localversion}/$link ln -sf /usr/src/linux-${PKGVERSION}-${localversion} ${TGTDIR}/lib/modules/${PKGVERSION}-${localversion}/${link} done find ${TGTDIR}/lib/modules/${PKGVERSION}-${localversion} -type f -name '*.ko' -exec x86_64-linux-gnu-strip --strip-unneeded {} \; cd ../linux-${PKGVERSION} tar -cf - . | tar -C ${TGTDIR}/usr/src/linux-${PKGVERSION}-${localversion} -xvf -
